content.raw:
Thanks for that update. Due to a conference it took some time for testing, so here are my results:

All cards initialize now.

For the NI\_6534: It is working fine down to the minimum pulse length of 100ns. Also restarting the tab and reinitialising works fine

For the NI\_6713: Outputs work fine; Timing is also okay but there is this problem with “4 samples per channel” poping up depending on my code \( which makes sense :smiley: \).

For NI\_6251: get capabilities finds 2 Anaolog Outputs and port 0 to 2 with 8 Digital outs each but this card has 16 analog ins which are not found.
content.html:
Thanks for that update. Due to a conference it took some time for testing, so here are my results:

All cards initialize now.

For the NI_6534: It is working fine down to the minimum pulse length of 100ns. Also restarting the tab and reinitialising works fine

For the NI_6713: Outputs work fine; Timing is also okay but there is this problem with “4 samples per channel” poping up depending on my code ( which makes sense ).

For NI_6251: get capabilities finds 2 Anaolog Outputs and port 0 to 2 with 8 Digital outs each but this card has 16 analog ins which are not found.
